DOC.brief_summary: CP-690,550 and midazolam are metabolized by similar enzymes in the liver. This study is designed to assess whether co-administration of CP-690,500 and midazolam will effect the metabolism of midazolam in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: CP-690,550 and Midazolam Drug-Drug Interaction Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female (nonchild bearing potential) subjects Clinically significant infections within the past 3 months History of previously untreated infection with Mycobacterium tuberculosis Positive screening test for hepatitis B surface antigen, antihepatitis C antibody, or human immunodeficiency virus
DOC.keyword: drug interactions CYP3A4 CYP3A5 midazolam anti-rheumatic agents
